pullRequest.title: Update resolving logic of project name and polish SentinelConfig
pullRequest.bodyText:
Signed-off-by: Eric Zhao sczyh16@gmail.com

Describe what this PR does / why we need it
Update resolving logic of project name and polish SentinelConfig
Does this pull request fix one issue?
Polish for #1191
Describe how you did it

Update resolving logic of the project name. Now the order of resolving the name is: system env (CSP_SENTINEL_APP_NAME) > property (csp.sentinel.app.name) > property (project.name) > main class (or jar) name
Polish related code in SentinelConfig

Describe how to verify it
Run the demo and add relevant attributes.
Special notes for reviews
NONE
